abstract: Human Rights Watch and Harvard Law School International Human Rights Clinic issue report calling for keeping human control over new autonomous weapons that can target and attack without decisions of people.

headline.print_headline: Robot Weapons Raise Human Rights Fear
headline.main: Arms Control Groups Urge Human Control of Robot Weaponry

keywords.value: Arms Control and Limitation and Disarmament
keywords.name: subject

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject

snippet: In a report issued at a United Nations meeting, the groups said technology that leaves killing decisions to machines was “profoundly disturbing.”
lead_paragraph: In a report issued at a United Nations meeting, the groups said technology that leaves killing decisions to machines was “profoundly disturbing.”
